ygData.subject: Re: Dress Up Wear
ygData.msgSnippet: BAH since when have i known you to behave mik??
ygData.messageBody:
BAH since when have i known you to behave mik?? <thwaps mik>

Mikaela wrote:

> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela1@...>
>
> AOS!!!!!! Have you been lurking on this list unbeknowst to me? *thwaps her
> bud Aos*
>
> Hey everyone, I want you to meet Aosinator Lightbringer, level 50
> cleric/wannabe tank on The Rathe and my running mate in EQ ever since P4.
> She is a VERY knowledgeable cleric and will be able to help us LOTS here on
> the list with her experience. I owe all my early patchwork and later banded
> to her wonderful sewing and smithing skills. With all the money she made,
> she was also able to buy me all my spells up to level 24. She was without a
> doubt the richest level 15 cleric you ever saw. Had over 2000 plat in the
> bank which she spent on all 6 of our group for armor and spells. I'd of
> still been in patchwork at level 24 with about 4 spells if it weren't for
> Aos. <hugs Aos tight tight>
>
> Mik (who thinks she has to behave now that she knows Aos is watching her!!
> LOL)
